description: Here is another action. These are similar to the farting facemarks you just put the puff in front instead of behind. This way, it is like a puff of air coming from an open mouth. This gives the impression the emoticon is blowing air or even burping. (°༣°)༇༇ ε-(´・｀) ﾌ ₒ₍₊˒₃˓₎ₒ▁▂▃▅▆▓▒░✩⃛
title: Blowing
